title: Camera Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Rinako, Rinako! How’s that angle?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Good. Snap.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Don’t just say good. Say it’s cute~! Okay, let’s take another one over there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>How about that bench there? There are flowers, and there’s more sunlight.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah, sure! Great idea, Rinako!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m taking the picture. Snap. Okay, it looks great. Where next......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Let’s take a selfie next! Rinako, you want to take a cute picture with Kasumin, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin also wants to take a selfie with Rinako~! Okay, come closer~...... Nijigasaki~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Nijigasaki~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
